vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a commercial surface parking lot on property zoned Subdistrict F (WMU-12) within Planned Development District No. 468, the Oak Cliff Gateway Special Purpose District, on the northwest corner of East 11th Street and South Ewing Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z201-106(LG)
vote.description:

Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z201-106(LG)
